recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese.
Combine all ingredients and season with pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill chicken and slice.
Toss lettuce with dressing.
Top with chicken and croutons.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, topped with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a variety of fresh vegetables.
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger, add soy sauce.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken and Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta, top with chicken and sauce.

recipes.name: Caesar Wrap
recipes.description: A wrap filled with Caesar salad ingredients and grilled chicken.
instructions: Fill tortilla with salad ingredients and wrap.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa
recipes.description: A fresh salsa made with mango, red onion, and cilantro.
instructions: Mix diced mango with chopped onion and cilantro, and squeeze lime juice over it.

recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: A spicy Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.
instructions: Simmer shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass with chili paste.

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.description: Deep-fried balls made from chickpeas and spices.
instructions: Blend ingredients, form into balls, and fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Shrimp cooked in a garlic butter sauce, served over pasta.
instructions: Cook shrimp in butter and garlic, serve over pasta.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A moist and sweet bread made with ripe bananas.
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

recipes.name: Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: A whole chicken seasoned and roasted until crispy.
instructions: Season chicken, roast at 375°F for 1-1.5 hours.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy lemon bars with a buttery crust.
instructions: Prepare crust, bake, then top with lemon filling and bake again.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Combine ingredients and toss with olive oil and herbs.
